mapper.select: select pp.*, to_char(pp.starttime, 'HH24:MI') as startTimes from (select p.*, md.moviename from (select a.*, b.name from (select rs.*, rt.starttime, rt.endtime, rt.moviedate, rt.moviecount from ( (select r.*, s.SCREENCODE, s.SELECTSEAT from reserve r join seat s on (r.SEATCODE = s.SEATCODE) where email=#{email} order by r.RESERVECODE) rs join reserve_time rt on rs.timecode = rt.timecode)) a left join screen b on a.screencode = b.screencode) p left join movie_detail md on p.moviecode = md.num order by reservecode desc) pp
